thread.title: BRIEF-Och-Ziff Capital Entered Into Senior Secured Credit And Guaranty Agreement

title: BRIEF-Och-Ziff Capital Entered Into Senior Secured Credit And Guaranty Agreement

organizations.name: credit and guaranty agreement reuters staff

text:
April 10 (Reuters) - Och-Ziff Capital Management Group LLC :
* MANAGEMENT SAYS ON APRIL 10, CO & UNITS ENTERED INTO A SENIOR SECURED CREDIT AND GUARANTY AGREEMENT - SEC FILING
* CREDIT AGREEMENT CONSISTS OF A $250 MILLION TERM LOAN FACILITY AND A $100 MILLION REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY
* TERM LOAN FACILITY INITIALLY MATURES 5 YRS AFTER CLOSING DATE, REVOLVING FACILITY INITIALLY MATURES 4 YRS AND 6 MONTHS AFTER CLOSING DATE Source text ( bit.ly/2qoGYqb ) Further company coverage: (reuters.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
